Propaganda - simple as that. So this is for idiots. Intelligent people seek out information from different (preferrably neutral) sources, for a rational view on what happened.

@peter_gg

Ignorance - simple as that.

it is not about the point of view because this is an international crime. hate it or love it they have to right to spread this video to world.  

and yes killing unarmed people on international sea is totally idiot decision

Let the people decide it

This IS neutral you idiot. The fact that i'm a Turk doesn't change the unedited film. The reason why especially a Turk adds this as a torrent is because the original torrent containing a .mov file that this Turk seeded for a long time died and like the Jewish like to say "We will never forget".

to whom it may concern: I am Turkish with leftist aspirations and with no religious convictions. yet when it comes to humane understanding of things, I say: the flotilla's journey is of heroic dimensions. Israel's murderous standing in this life is crystal clear. one doesn't have to be an antisemitist to see what kind of political power is in charge in the cursed (not promised) land, and what they've been doing for decades. a last thing: those wiped out in the Holocaust and those living in the cursed (by the Jewish) land are in no way the same. God, if there were ever one, save all, friends. and thanks, TorrentTurk, whoever you are.. Palestine: every man's conscience..
